name: Numplussed - Number Puzzle Maze
description:
"With tons of free content, a unique premise, and satisfying problem-solving, Numplussed will surely bring out the mathlete in anyone." - 4/5 Gamezebo

Numplussed is a unique puzzle maze game. Each maze has numbers and an equals sign. As you move through the maze the numbers are added or subtracted to your running total. Can you get to the equals sign with the right running total?

The rules are very simple but the puzzles are fantastically puzzling!

Features:

- Unique and simple game mechanic
- Intuitive touch-and-drag controls
- 3 difficulty modes - Easy, Medium or Hard
- 125 free levels
- Up to 300,000 extra levels available for purchase
- Unlock new themes as you progress

"It’s a really thoughtful combination of math and movement that is an obvious recommendation for the math-minded, but should appeal to all fans of puzzles and pathfinding." - Gamezebo
